item.title: Cpu Manufacturing Is Just Magic For Me
item.description:
Why i think that way.

After watching countless amount of videos on the internet about, how Microchips/Microprocessors are manufactured. I still to this day just believe its just f*cking magic.

I am aware of the steps and processes that are done to manufacture them, but how the hell do you even do that bro??? like how the hell do you design 11 billion semiconductors in a silicon die that is just few millimeters in diameter. holy shit.
